title: Information Related to Addiction Treatment and Recovery Digital Health SBIR Grants (National Institute on Drug Abuse (NIDA))

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

We are requesting any records relevant to the Opioid Policy Insitute's ongoing scientific research related to privacy issues inherent to addiction treatment and recovery digital health approaches funded by NIH/NIDA or NSF:

1. Pre-application - pitch and solicitation conversation with NIH/NIDA or NSF employees related to their pending applications.

2. Funded applications:
A. Phase I - 
•	Business Plan
•	Executive summary
•	Cost Proposal
•	Technical Proposal
B. Phase II – 
Commercialization Plan 
•	Company information
•	Customer and Competition
•	Market
•	Intellectual Property
•	Financing
•	Assistance and Mentoring
3. Grant Review
4. Evaluation and grant review feedback.
5. Post-award conversations


For the following 35 grants funded by NIDA/NIH through their SBIR grant process and NSF through its grant process:

BOULDER CARE, INC
UEI: T231F5K6Z6L3
Total: $998,407 (2)

Phase I
Total Award Amount: $220,921
Contract Number: 1R44DA050354-01
Agency Tracking Number: R44DA050354
Solicitation Topic Code: NIDA
Solicitation Number: DA19-019

Phase II

title: Information Related to Addiction Treatment and Recovery Digital Health SBIR Grants (National Institutes of Health)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

We are requesting any records relevant to the Opioid Policy Insitute's ongoing scientific research related to privacy issues inherent to addiction treatment and recovery digital health approaches funded by NIH/NIDA or NSF:

1. Pre-application - pitch and solicitation conversation with NIH/NIDA or NSF employees related to their pending applications.

2. Funded applications:
A. Phase I - 
•	Business Plan
•	Executive summary
•	Cost Proposal
•	Technical Proposal
B. Phase II – 
Commercialization Plan 
•	Company information
•	Customer and Competition
•	Market
•	Intellectual Property
•	Financing
•	Assistance and Mentoring
3. Grant Review
4. Evaluation and grant review feedback.
5. Post-award conversations


For the following 35 grants funded by NIDA/NIH through their SBIR grant process and NSF through its grant process:

BOULDER CARE, INC
